headline: Kadant (KAI) Beats Q2 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: Kadant (KAI) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +19.07% and +3.66%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Kadant (KAI) Beats Q2 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
raw.summary: Kadant (KAI) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +19.07% and +3.66%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Industrial sector outperformance: 3 themes to watch
summary: The industrial sector (XLI) has outperformed the S&P 500 (^GSPC) year to date. Neuberger Berman portfolio manager for climate innovation and next-generation space economy strategy, Evelyn Chow, outlines three themes to watch in the industrial sector. She also shares some top stock picks in the sector that are set to benefit from these themes. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination here.
